title: DQH2 & TWWH2 Proper Cracks Added
body: Recently CODEX cracked two Denuvo games – Dragon Quest Heroes 2 and Total War: Warhammer II, making scene “propers”. Since game builds they released are the same, as my repacks, you need only those cracks – no point to make a full re-repacks for me. I’ve added multiple mirrors for each crack on respective game pages.
